review: Very good doctor. Like the way he does the diagnosis.  Proper treatment and advice is prescribed. Highly recommend.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: ** ********* ** **** *** ** *** He has treated my child for 5-6years.He is soft spoken, patient, listens every word , never prescribes unnecessary medicine. Till now I wish to see my child to him but it's not always easy to get appointment. Highly recommend him to all and want to express my sicere gratitude to the doctor for all his help in treating my child.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I went to him for my elder daughter till 7-8 year's. * ***** *** * **** ************* He is very polite and he listens to problem with outmost care in details. He tries to avoid medicines, that is best part. I feel very comfortable to connect with the doctor, any immergency he is the 1st pediatrician comes in our mind. Thanks a lot doctor.
